backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining all types, persistent state stores, and business logic for the Left2Lift food donation platform, including role-based access, spoilage prediction, NGO matching, donation lifecycle management, and system analytics.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old actor state to the new schema, adding fields like `city` to donations, introducing the `volunteer` role, and mapping all legacy types to their updated equivalents.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (home page, donate food page, etc.) to their source files, component dependencies, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short descriptions of key frontend source files, summarizing bug fixes and feature additions made to each component or hook.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS file that imports Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for the design system's color tokens in both light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Left2Lift React app, mounting the app into a `#root` div and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that handles authentication state, profile loading, and role-based routing to HotelPanel, NGOPanel, or AdminPanel, with fallbacks for login and role selection screens.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminFoodS: Admin table view of all donations showing food safety status (safe/unsafe) with inline status dropdowns that allow admins to update each donation's status.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSyste: Admin dashboard panel displaying platform-wide metrics (kg redistributed, total users, donations, waste reduced, and estimated people fed) in a card grid.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUserM: Admin panel listing all registered hotels and NGOs in separate tables with user counts and a deactivate action per user.
frontend/src/components/donation/NGOMatc: Card component that displays the best-matched NGO for a donation, showing the NGO name, area, distance, and estimated pickup time with a loading skeleton state.
frontend/src/components/donation/RoutePr: Displays a route preview card showing pickup and delivery addresses with an embedded OpenStreetMap iframe centered on a Maharashtra city, plus a link to the full map.
frontend/src/components/donation/SafetyB: Renders a color-coded badge (green/yellow/red) indicating food safety status with remaining hours and an AI food safety engine attribution.
Fixed top banner component that displays an animated emergency alert when emergency mode is active, with a dismiss button to deactivate it.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelDashb: Shows a hotel donor's dashboard with summary metric cards (total donations, kg donated, completed deliveries, people fed) and a sortable donation history table.
frontend/src/components/hotel/HotelDonat: Provides a form for hotels to submit food donations with fields for food type, quantity, storage condition, and pickup details, then displays a safety and NGO-match result card.
frontend/src/components/impact/AnimatedS: Displays a single statistic with an animated count-up effect over 2 seconds, supporting optional unit and decimal formatting.
frontend/src/components/impact/CityBreak: Renders a horizontal bar chart of food redistribution (kg) per Maharashtra city, falling back to demo data when real totals are zero.
frontend/src/components/impact/Leaderboa: Displays a static leaderboard table of top food donors across Maharashtra cities with rank icons (crown/medal/award) and total kg donated.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main app layout component with a sticky header showing the Left2Lift logo, user role badge, display name, and logout button, plus a footer with attribution links.
frontend/src/components/ngo/MapPreviewCa: Shows a compact route preview card for NGOs with from/to addresses and an embedded OpenStreetMap iframe centered on the relevant Maharashtra city.
frontend/src/components/ngo/NGODashboard: Displays an NGO dashboard with summary metrics (donations received, total kg, people served) and a full donation history table, fetching data via React Query hooks.
frontend/src/components/ngo/NGODonationR: Renders individual donation request cards for NGOs with accept/reject actions, urgency/expiry indicators, hotel profile lookup, and an inline feedback form for completed donations.
Lists active NGO donation requests with food safety scoring, emergency-mode priority sorting, expandable detail cards, and accept/reject mutation handlers.
frontend/src/components/ngo/NGOFeedbackF: A form component that allows NGOs to submit a star rating and optional comment for a completed donation via the submitFeedback mutation.
frontend/src/components/ngo/NGOMetrics.t: Displays animated summary metric cards (total donations, kg received, people served) computed from a list of NGO donations.
frontend/src/components/ngo/NGOProfileFo: A form for registering or updating an NGO profile, collecting organization name, location, daily capacity, and food type preferences, then submitting via the registerNGO mutation.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelectionScr: Onboarding screen that lets new users pick a role (Hotel, NGO, or Admin) and enter a display name, then saves the profile via a mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/volunteer/Assign: Renders a volunteer assignment card for a donation, showing food type, quantity, pickup address, countdown timer, safety badge, and action buttons to mark pickup or delivery based on donation status.
frontend/src/components/volunteer/Urgent: Displays animated red alert banners for urgent food pickup assignments, showing area, meal count, and hours remaining for each urgent item.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAppTheme.tsx: Provides a React context and hook for managing light/dark theme state, persisting the preference to localStorage and toggling the 'dark' class on the document root.
frontend/src/hooks/useCityContext.tsx: Provides a React context and hook for managing the selected city state, persisting the value to sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown.ts: Custom hook that computes and updates a countdown (hours and minutes remaining) from a nanosecond-precision expiry timestamp, refreshing every minute.
frontend/src/hooks/useEmergencyMode.tsx: Provides a React context and hook for toggling emergency mode state, persisting the boolean value to sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: Custom hook that fetches the current authenticated user's profile from the backend actor using React Query, combining actor loading state with query loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication via DFINITY's AuthClient, providing a React context and hook with login, logout, and identity state management including delegation validity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useLanguage.tsx: Provides a React context and hook for managing the active UI language, persisting the selection to localStorage and exposing a translation helper function.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data, including user profiles, donations, NGO/hotel/volunteer assignments, and system analytics.
frontend/src/hooks/useToast.tsx: Provides a React context, provider, and hook for displaying auto-dismissing toast notifications (success, error, info) rendered in a fixed bottom-right overlay.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for light/dark themes using oklch colors, and declares reusable component classes like glass-card, emergency badges, and keyframe animations.
frontend/src/lib/foodSafetyEngine.ts: Pure utility that calculates food safety status (Safe/Urgent/Unsafe) based on storage condition, food type perishability, time since cooking, and Maharashtra city heat factors, returning remaining hours and a badge class.
frontend/src/lib/ngoMatchingEngine.ts: Contains a static dataset of Maharashtra NGOs and city centers, a Haversine distance function, and a findNearestNGO function that scores and returns the best NGO match based on proximity, urgency, and capacity.
frontend/src/lib/speechUtils.ts: Provides browser speech recognition (startVoiceRecognition), a parser to extract food type, quantity, and time from voice transcripts (parseDonateSpeech), and a text-to-speech function for impact summaries (speakImpactSummary).
frontend/src/lib/translations.ts: Defines a multilingual translation map for English, Hindi, and Marathi covering all UI strings including navigation, food types, form labels, and status values.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility helpers for class merging (cn), formatting enums (food type, storage condition, donation status), status color mapping, and timestamp/nanosecond conversions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root with QueryClientProvider, InternetIdentityProvider, and the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanel.tsx: Admin page component that renders a tabbed layout with three sections: system analytics, user management, and food safety monitoring, each backed by a dedicated sub-component.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page featuring a hero section with animated stats, city selector, and voice input that parses speech to pre-fill the donation form and navigate to it.
frontend/src/pages/HotelPanel.tsx: Hotel user dashboard page with two tabs: a new donation form and a dashboard view for tracking past donations and impact.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Authentication page that displays the Left2Lift branding and feature highlights alongside an Internet Identity login card.
frontend/src/pages/NGOPanel.tsx: NGO dashboard page that shows a profile setup form if no profile exists, otherwise renders tabs for donation requests, dashboard stats, and profile editing.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading URL query parameters from both standard and hash-based routes, with helpers for persisting values in sessionStorage and cleaning sensitive params from the URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining a custom design system with OKLCH-based green/orange color palettes, Poppins/Inter fonts, glass-effect shadows, and slide/fade animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the full project state (version 5) for 'From Waste to Plate â€“ Maharashtra Edition', an AI-powered food redistribution platform. Contains architectural notes, feature list, tech stack details, design rules, known issues, and image requirements.
